function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in air change rate due to window opening","Impact":"Risk of rapid influx of outdoor air carrying contaminants or pathogens","Mitigation":"Use of air filters or controlled ventilation to regulate air change rate","Technologies":"HVAC systems with air filters and adjustable ventilation","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Presence of turbulent eddies at the window opening","Impact":"Risk of dispersing contaminants or pathogens throughout the indoor space","Mitigation":"Placement of air purifiers or use of directional ventilation to control air flow","Technologies":"Air purifiers with HEPA filters, directional ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those in close proximity to the window","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Inaccurate air change rate measurement due to transient effects","Impact":"Risk of misjudging the efficiency of ventilation and air quality control","Mitigation":"Calibration of air quality monitoring devices and consideration of transient effects in data analysis","Technologies":"Advanced air quality monitoring devices with transient analysis capabilities","People":"HVAC technicians, indoor air quality specialists","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance staff"}]}
